mapper.sql: SELECT A.STD_NO , B.USER_NM , C.USER_ID , FN_GET_SCORE_EXAM(A.CRS_CRE_CD, A.STD_NO) AS EXAM_SCORE , FN_GET_SCORE_ASMT(A.CRS_CRE_CD, A.STD_NO) AS ASMT_SCORE , FN_GET_SCORE_FORUM(A.CRS_CRE_CD, A.STD_NO) AS FORUM_SCORE FROM tb_std_std A, tb_usr_user_info B, tb_usr_login C WHERE B.USER_NO = C.USER_NO AND A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND A.CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND C.USER_STS = 'U' AND A.ENRL_STS IN ('S','C','F')

select A.CRS_CRE_CD , A.CRS_CD , A.CRE_YEAR , A.CRE_TERM , A.CRS_CRE_NM , F.ENRL_APLC_START_DTTM , F.ENRL_APLC_END_DTTM , F.ENRL_START_DTTM , F.ENRL_END_DTTM , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.NOP_LIMIT_YN),'N') AS NOP_LIMIT_YN , A.ENRL_NOP , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.EDU_PRICE),0) AS EDU_PRICE , A.SCORE_HANDL_CD , A.CPLT_SCORE , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.PRGR_RATIO),0) AS PRGR_RATIO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.ATTD_RATIO),0) AS ATTD_RATIO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.EXAM_RATIO),0) AS EXAM_RATIO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.FORUM_RATIO),0) AS FORUM_RATIO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.ASMT_RATIO),0) AS ASMT_RATIO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.PRJT_RATIO),0) AS PRJT_RATIO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.JOIN_RATIO),0) AS JOIN_RATIO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.ETC_RATIO),0) AS ETC_RATIO , A.DAY_STUDY_LIMIT , A.REG_NO , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.REG_NO) ) AS REG_NM , A.REG_DTTM , A.MOD_NO , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.MOD_NO) ) AS MOD_NM , A.MOD_DTTM , (SELECT FN_GET_CRS_STD_PRGR(D.STD_NO, A.CRS_CRE_CD)) AS PRE_PRGR_RATIO , ROUND((SELECT FN_GET_BOOKMARK_TIME(D.STD_NO, A.CRS_CRE_CD))/60) AS CONN_TM , (SELECT FN_GET_BOOKMARK_CNT(D.STD_NO, A.CRS_CRE_CD)) AS CONN_CNT , D.STD_NO , D.ENRL_STS , (SELECT FN_GET_CODE_NAME('ENRL_STS',IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(D.ENRL_STS),''))) AS ENRL_STS_NM , D.EDU_NO , D.CPLT_NO , D.GET_CREDIT , D.PAYM_NO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(E.PRGR_SCORE),0) as PRGR_SCORE , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(E.ATTD_SCORE),0) as ATTD_SCORE , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(E.EXAM_SCORE),0) as EXAM_SCORE , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(E.SEMI_EXAM_SCORE),0) as SEMI_EXAM_SCORE , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(E.FORUM_SCORE),0)as FORUM_SCORE , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(E.ASMT_SCORE),0) as ASMT_SCORE , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(E.PRJT_SCORE),0) as PRJT_SCORE , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(E.JOIN_SCORE),0) as JOIN_SCORE , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(E.ETC_SCORE),0) as ETC_SCORE , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(E.TOT_SCORE),0) as TOT_SCORE , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(E.CONV_SCORE),0) as CONV_SCORE , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(E.PRGR_RATE),0) as PRGR_RATE , E.SCORE_LVL , F.CRS_NM , F.SCORE_OPEN_START_DTTM , F.SCORE_OPEN_END_DTTM
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_crs_cre_crs A INNER JOIN tb_crs_crs F ON A.CRS_CD = F.CRS_CD INNER JOIN tb_std_std D ON ( A.CRS_CRE_CD = D.CRS_CRE_CD AND D.USER_NO = #{userNo} ) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_std_edu_rslt E ON ( D.STD_NO = E.STD_NO )
WHERE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') > DATE_FORMAT(A.ENRL_END_DTTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AND D.ENRL_STS IN ('S','C','F')
